DOC.brief_summary: This study Post-Marketing Surveillance study Korea evaluate safety efficacy botulinum toxin Type A treat urinary incontinence patient neurogenic detrusor overactivity ( NDO ) overactive bladder ( OAB ) adequately control anticholinergic drug .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy Botulinum Toxin Type A ( BOTOX® ) Treat Urinary Incontinence Due Neurogenic Detrusor Overactivity Overactive Bladder Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients urinary incontinence due NDO OAB treat BOTOX® per local standard care clinical practice .
